h2_title: Where to use Mind Cores in Black Myth: Wukong
content: You can then use these items on the Tallies around Yellow Wind Ridge. To access the Crouching Tiger Temple cellar, you will need to activate the Tally in the arena where you fought the Tiger Vanguard and continue down until you reach the slope, leading you to the Shrine.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Mind_Core.md', within the main section titled 'Mind Core', specifically from the subsection 'Where to use Mind Cores in Black Myth: Wukong'.
The content is as follows:
You can then use these items on the Tallies around Yellow Wind Ridge. To access the Crouching Tiger Temple cellar, you will need to activate the Tally in the arena where you fought the Tiger Vanguard and continue down until you reach the slope, leading you to the Shrine.
